settings.titleDesc: Total goroutines >= Sum of all module goroutines

query.q: eval(A/B, alias='Goroutine live time', A="M::`dk`:(AVG(`datakit_goroutine_cost_seconds_sum`)) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `name`", B="M::`dk`:(AVG(`datakit_goroutine_cost_seconds_count`)) { `host` = '#{host}' } BY `name`")

eval(A/B, alias='TTFB', A="M::`dk`:(AVG(`datakit_httpcli_got_first_resp_byte_cost_seconds`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `from` = 'dataway' } BY `from`", B="M::`dk`:(AVG(`datakit_httpcli_got_first_resp_byte_cost_seconds_count`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `from` = 'dataway' } BY `from`")

eval(A/B, alias='DNS 解析耗时', A="M::`dk`:(LAST(`datakit_httpcli_dns_cost_seconds_sum`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `from` = 'dataway' } BY `from`", B="M::`dk`:(LAST(`datakit_httpcli_dns_cost_seconds_count`)) { `host` = '#{host}' and `from` = 'dataway' } BY `from`")

charts.name: Datakit: top(n) of heap memory usage

settings.titleDesc: Same as the top command output
The memory usage comes from Golang runtime
If the usage exceeds the limit, new data cannot be  uploaded
